name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Sync Call
title: Propose synchronous smart contract call
description: Create a proposal to make a synchronous call to a smart contract from the MultiSig wallet. Sync calls work well with builtin functions and can include token transfers. The proposal requires quorum approval before execution.

inputs.name: Contract Address
inputs.description: The smart contract address to call.

inputs.name: EGLD Amount
inputs.description: The amount of EGLD to send with the call (in wei, will be scaled by 18 decimals).

inputs.name: Gas Limit
inputs.description: Optional gas limit for the execution (leave empty for default).

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The sync call proposal is now awaiting signatures.
